12.10.19  9:30 pm   how to invent time and space

12.10.19  8:34 pm   hi Bill i am having some major health worries at the moment and am feeling very very scared and alone, can you please send me some well wishes to give me strength
p.s. thank you for your beautiful music 

     the first thing to do is just simply make sure you are doing everything you know of logistically, to help with your situation (which i'm sure you are already doing, if you are scared). Beyond that, it might be useful to rememeber that the healing power of the human body is absolutely ridiculous. the fact that life is able to even exist in the first place, and magically grow, and move on its own, ..... all that is nothing short of magic, even when you know all the scientific details. why should healing be any exception

12.10.19  4:00 pm   Help, we had castings for a film, then contacted the wrong actor! What do we do?

     call them for a brief private meeting, tell them you're terribly sorry, you've made an embarassing mistake, you've called the wrong person, and they're not actually going to be in the film. If you are still feeling embarassed and willing to go above and beyond, you could give them 1 day's pay just for showing up

12.10.19  10:50 am   do you have airpods

     yes but they can't be used for music recording because the latency is still way too high. they can be used for listening because there is smart buffering so the audio/visual sync is perfect, but you still have to pay the delay if you want it to actually respond to your input

12.10.19  5:16 am   Hey Bill, I need your help.

I have a bunch of things I have to do like studying for history, setting up my strat guitar, putting together tracks, tracking acoustic guitar, vocals, drums, editing some songs, making a short film, try to make a live music video, etc. But then I see this list and I can't decide which one to do first and somehow become overwhelmed and lazy, so I procrastinate.

How do I get my work done?

     get an audio recording device, press record, get on the computer, learn how to take screen shots if you can't already, and start brainstorming, and type out the list. take screenshots as you go (and say "screenshot" each time you do) so anyone who finds your recordings in the future can follow along with you. (screen recording is even better, if you do that just make sure at the beginning you say "sync" and clap your hands once). congratulations, now you are on TV, which is fun, and you're not allowed to be lazy on tv. so keep discussing things until you figure out what order the list should be in. Then once you have that, it should be much easier to do things in the order you have endorsed. This advice sounds outrageous now that i say it, but that's the exact and only way it works for me

12.10.19  5:05 am   What's your favourite time signature?

     regular

12.10.19  3:49 am   You said in an answer that you don't like the bass by itself.

     i didn't quite say that.....

      Is Jaco and in particulr Portrait of Tracy an exception? 

     it's great, but that contains a heck of a lot of non-bass. it's all being created by an instrument that is intended for bass, but he has used it to create a heck of a lot of sounds that are not bass at all

12.10.19  1:27 am   when you start making music for the first time, does one make stuff about whatever and then you notice people like it, or you look into what people like and then do stuff around that?

     a lot of people probably cater to what they think their audience likes. i personally think that is a curse, and absolutely never do it

12.10.19  1:08 am   btw ur videos are the best

     holy smokes, you are very friendly

12.10.19  12:59 am   how do you feel about all these questions?

     pretty good

      i feel like after awhile it would get tiring and you'd answer stuff in a really generic way,

     that's what i would fear also

      but yet you still give out a lot of legitimately thought provoking and interesting answers

     i am aware of the risk of degradation of the answers, especially because almost every question is one i've answered before, but, nonetheless, i place extremely high value on the phenomenon of the questions page, and before every question answering session i have a mantra that i say to myself, which is that "my new years resolution is to do a great job on questions today". this has nothing to do with new years, and i say that regardless of what time of year it is

12.10.19  12:50 am   how can i be as amazing and talented as you?

     how can i be as generous and friendly as you
